phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
It is a bit dangerous, but they have some very effective magical items.
I really should not be wasting time here, anyway.
The Black Market is no place for you lovely ladies.
I took the Entrance Exam with him.
Ah, you are a member of the Green Praying Mantises.
He is with two beautiful girls?!
They are both members of the Black Bulls, too.
Besides, it is all your fault that I ended up in the Green Praying Mantises.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Are you out shopping with these girls?
Even if it is your day off, should not you be finding some basic tasks
to do for points, instead of messing around?
I heard the Black Bulls have negative stars
We got a star from the Wizard King on our first mission!
Seems like you are working hard.
He is got some nerve, stealing in front of Magic Knights.
But everything will be fine if we leave it to the little boy.
I am not going to let you steal all the glory, Asta!
Bronze Creation Magic: Sekke Shooting Star!
You lovely ladies can go relax with that old lady.
I am not letting you get away!
How is he catching up to me when he is only running?
I have to do something about that cloud, or I will never catch up.
If it is a cloud created by magic...
Do you actually think you can cut through my Bandit's Cloud Wind
I am going to take the glory on this one!
Knock off that stupid laugh of yours!
I am taking you down with me...
Now that I think about it, I was once trying to get to the top, too...
I hate that I have to leave everything to him, but...
You are the man who defeated me.
Make it all the way to the top for my sake, too.
I am leaving my dream to you!
I guess going out like this is not so bad.
Do not leave something so important with me!
Survive and make your own dream come true!
Do not give up, you idiot!
There is no way this would kill you.
It is just a momentary numbing poison.
Put this Shique ointment on it, and you will be better in no time.
Make sure you stay diligent until the next time I see you, Asta!
On the outside, our little boy definitely looks younger than him,
but it seems our little boy is much stronger on the inside.
Do not let it get taken again, madam.
That is a type of magic I have never seen before.
Yami sure took in an interesting kid.
This is why I cannot stop wandering around in disguise.
What in the world are you doing, Wizard King?
I am strolling through the castle town looking for new magic.
Have you any awareness of your position?!
Encounters with magic are once in a lifetime.
You never know what kind of magic you are going to encounter and where.
Listen to me, you magic nerd!
Is not that the new kid from William's squad?
Well, I am off to encounter even more new magic.
Member of the Golden Dawn Klaus Lunettes
The Golden Dawn's new recruit, Yuno...
Member of the Golden Dawn Yuno
The candidate that every Magic Knight Captain wanted at the Entrance Exam.
Member of the Golden Dawn Mimosa Vermillion
And then we have the other new recruit, Mimosa Vermillion, from the royal family.
to act as bodyguards for Salim de Hapshass.
We are to escort the son of Hapshass, who serves in the House of Lords,
to our ally, the Heart Kingdom?
You know who Lord Hapshass is, do not you?
I have only heard negative things about him, such as that he is new money.
I am sure that is why he is worried that his son, who is going to study in the Heart Kingdom,
might be attacked by bandits on the way.
But there are many powerful mages among the lord's family...
Apparently, he feels having Magic Knights act as his bodyguards will be safer.
Lord Hapshass makes very generous donations to the Magic Knights every year,
so it is rather hard to decline.
We need to accept every kind of mission.
That will also benefit the Clover Kingdom.
I am sure with you along as their mentor, they will be more than enough.
I am counting on you to look after the new recruits.
Salim de Hapshass lost to Yuno in the final part of the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.
He ended up being unable to join the Magic Knights.
So why was Yuno appointed as one of his bodyguards?
My first mission... I am so nervous.
Klaus, Yuno, it is a pleasure to work with you.
Do not let your guard down, Mimosa.
I requested you as my bodyguard because I want to apologize.
I hear that you intend to become the Wizard King.
You were chosen by all of the captains.
You could have joined any squad,
and you ended up choosing the Golden Dawn, so I had a feeling.
The more you achieve from now on,
the more your name will spread throughout the kingdom...
Yuno, the one who bears the four-leaf clover grimoire.
Make sure your dream of becoming the Wizard King comes true.
And then I will be able to brag to my future children
that I once fought the Wizard King.
And then they will say, Daddy, you are so cool!
We have some time before we get to the Heart Kingdom.
Could you tell me a little more about yourself?
I will not pester you if you are not up for it.
It is a village in the Forsaken Realm, is not it?
I think that is where the legend of the first Wizard King
who defeated the demons comes from.
It is not just a legend.
A giant demon skull is actually still there.
Apparently, I was found abandoned in front of a church when I was a baby.
I have never seen my parents, and I have no idea who they are.
The church was very poor, but the father and sister there took very good care of me.
I am very grateful to them.
but there must be someone in the Hapshass family
How did we get stuck with this?
Not to mention, we are the only bodyguards.
If there was a real threat of an attack, would not they have more bodyguards?
There are too many unknowns on this mission.
I will go check them out.
Were those men not after Salim?
I did not even have the opportunity to use my Lightning God Rising Salim.
I am even more interested in you now.
Why do not you take me to your town?
I want to see the place where you were born.
I want to know where you had to live to grow up so strong.
Lord Salim, that is rather out of the way.
we do not know what else might happen along the way,
so we should head straight for the Heart Kingdom
No matter who may come after me, you three will protect me, will not you?
But for nobility to go to a peasant village in the Forsaken Realm...
It will just be a quick stop.
I am sure Yuno would like to see everyone back at his church, too.
So that is the demon's skull!
And on top of it is a statue of the first Wizard King.
It is only been two months since I left.
You look more like an adult.
We are stopping by briefly during our mission.
Why must I visit this village in the Forsaken Realm?
I am Klaus Lunettes of the honorable Golden Dawn, led by William Vangeance.
I am a mentor to these new recruits.
Thank you for looking after Yuno.
I have heard of you from Yuno's letters.
What did you write about me?
I am Mimosa Vermillion, one of Yuno's colleagues.
I have heard of you, too, Mimosa.
What did you write about me?
the son of Lord Hapshass and the heir to the Hapshass family, Salim de Hapshass.
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
N-No, it is all right, Sister.
What are you doing here, Yuno?
Are you keeping in contact with Asta?
Are you staying the night tonight?
Unfortunately, we are just stopping by.
We have to hurry on our way.
Now, now, we do not have to be in such a hurry.
We can spare an hour or so.
In that case, I will prepare some famous Hage tato dishes.
Yuno, stay and have some food.
That goes for all of you.
I have never seen such a tiny church.
Yuno, tell us about the Magic Knights.
Why must I enter such a filthy little church?
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
You have not learned the ways of bah-ha at all yet.
Ah, so you understand how grand it is!
That part in front is especially awesome!
You are starting to understand the ways of bah-ha!
Starting today, you have attained bah-ha!
He is so insolent for a new recruit.
If you do not listen to me, you will feel the wrath of my glasses!
Black Clover, Page 13: The Wizard King Saw, Continued.
Page 13 The Wizard King Saw, Continued
Not giving up is my magic!
